name: T-Rex crush traffic: Survival
description:
A time travel dinosaur appear at the middle of the city and cause chaostic rampage.
Use your finger to draw a line to move the vehicles safety to the correct lanes.
Features:
- Intuitive gesture recognition drawing gameplay.
- Simple concept that anyone can grasp!
- Full game center support to compete with friends.
- Collect coin along the way can buy you more time.
